blocks.name: elnev
blocks.content: Any set that contains one element less than the universe is not equal to it. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 16-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm elnev(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, universe), wne(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, universe), wne(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), universe), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  isset(s0, c0)
  necon2abii(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), universe, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  bitri(wceq(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), universe), wn(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  eqeq2i(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), universe, cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  df-universe(s0)
  3bitr3ri(wceq(cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wn(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wal(s0, wb(wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  albii(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  tbt(wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  equid(s0)
  alnex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  abbi(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elnev(setvar s0, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†” { s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 } â‰  ğ•Œ)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, { s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 } â‰  ğ•Œ, âˆƒ(s0, s0 = c0))
  isset(s0, c0)
  necon2abii({ s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 }, universe, âˆƒ(s0, s0 = c0))
  bitri({ s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 } = ğ•Œ, Â¬ âˆƒ(s0, s0 = c0), { s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 } = { s0 | s0 = s0 })
  eqeq2i({ s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 }, universe, { s0 | s0 = s0 })
  df-universe(s0)
  3bitr3ri({ s0 | Â¬ s0 = c0 } = { s0 | s0 = s0 }, Â¬ âˆƒ(s0, s0 = c0), âˆ€(s0, Â¬ s0 = c0), âˆ€(s0,(Â¬ s0 = c0 â†” s0 = s0)))
  albii(s0, Â¬ s0 = c0, (Â¬ s0 = c0 â†” s0 = s0))
  tbt(Â¬ s0 = c0, s0 = s0)
  equid(s0)
  alnex(s0, s0 = c0)
  abbi(s0, Â¬ s0 = c0, s0 = s0)
}

blocks.name: rusbcALT
blocks.content: A version of Russell's paradox which is proven using proper substitution. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 18-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rusbcALT(setvar s0) {
  |- wnel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe)
} = {
  mpbir(wnel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe), wn(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe)))
  mto(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe), wb(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wn(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))))
  pm5.19(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  3bitr3d(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wn(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))))), wsbc(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wnel(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0))))
  sbcnel12g(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  sbc8g(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  syl5bb(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe), wnel(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0))), wn(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))))), wn(wcel(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))
  df-nel(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)))
  notbid(wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe), wcel(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0))), wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  eleq12d(csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), csb(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cv(s0)), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe))
  csbvarg(s0, cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe)
  df-nel(cab(s0, wnel(cv(s0), cv(s0))), universe)
}

  âŠ¢ { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } âˆ‰ ğ•Œ
} = {

  syl5bb({ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ, [{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0 âˆ‰[{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0, Â¬ { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } âˆˆ { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 }, Â¬[{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0 âˆˆ[{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0)
  df-nel([{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0, [{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0)

  eleq12d([{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0, [{ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } / s0]s0, { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 }, { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 }, { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  csbvarg(s0, { s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 }, universe)
  df-nel({ s0 | s0 âˆ‰ s0 }, universe)
}

blocks.name: compel
blocks.content: Equivalence between two ways of saying "is a member of the complement of ` A ` ". (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2011.)

blocks.name: compeq
blocks.content: Equality between two ways of saying "the complement of ` A ` ". (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2011.)

blocks.name: compne
blocks.content: The complement of ` A ` is not equal to ` A ` . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2011.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 11-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm compne(class c0) {
  |- wne(cdif(universe, c0), c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wne(cdif(universe, c0), c0), wne(universe, emptycls))
  vn0()
  necon3i(universe, emptycls, cdif(universe, c0), c0)
  eqtr3d(universe, emptycls, cdif(universe, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  syl6eq(cdif(universe, c0), universe, cdif(universe, emptycls), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  difeq2d(universe, c0, emptycls, wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  eqtr3d(c0, emptycls, cdif(universe, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  id(wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  dif0(universe)
  3eqtr3g(cdif(universe, c0), emptycls, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c0), cdif(c0, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  difeq1(cdif(universe, c0), c0, c0)
  difabs(universe, c0)
  difid(c0)
}

thm compne(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (ğ•Œ \ c0)â‰  c0
} = {
  ax-mp((ğ•Œ \ c0)â‰  c0, ğ•Œ â‰  âˆ…)
  vn0()
  necon3i(universe, emptycls, (ğ•Œ \ c0), c0)
  eqtr3d(universe, emptycls, (ğ•Œ \ c0), (ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  syl6eq((ğ•Œ \ c0), universe, (ğ•Œ \ âˆ…), (ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  difeq2d(universe, c0, emptycls, (ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  eqtr3d(c0, emptycls, (ğ•Œ \ c0), (ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  id((ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  dif0(universe)
  3eqtr3g((ğ•Œ \ c0), emptycls, ((ğ•Œ \ c0)\ c0), (c0 \ c0), (ğ•Œ \ c0)= c0)
  difeq1((ğ•Œ \ c0), c0, c0)
  difabs(universe, c0)
  difid(c0)
}

blocks.name: compneOLD

blocks.origin:
thm compneOLD(class c0) {
  |- wne(cdif(universe, c0), c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wne(cdif(universe, c0), c0), wne(universe, emptycls))
  vn0()
  necon3i(universe, emptycls, cdif(universe, c0), c0)
  eqtrd(universe, emptycls, c0, wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  syl6eq(universe, c0, cun(c0, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  syl5eq(universe, cun(c0, c0), cun(cdif(universe, c0), c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  eqtr4i(universe, cun(cdif(universe, c0), c0), cun(universe, c0))
  eqssi(universe, cun(universe, c0))
  ssun1(universe, c0)
  ssv(cun(universe, c0))
  undif1(universe, c0)
  uneq1(cdif(universe, c0), c0, c0)
  unidm(c0)
  syl6eq(c0, emptycls, cdif(c0, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  eqtrd(c0, cdif(c0, c0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  syl5req(c0, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c0), cdif(universe, c0), wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  difabs(universe, c0)
  id(wceq(cdif(universe, c0), c0))
  difeq1(cdif(universe, c0), c0, c0)
  difid(c0)
}

blocks.name: compab
blocks.content: Two ways of saying "the complement of a class abstraction". (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm compab(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cdif(universe, cab(s0, w0)), cab(s0, wn(w0)))
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, wceq(cdif(universe, cab(s0, w0)), cab(s0, wn(w0))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(universe, cab(s0, w0))), wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, wn(w0)))))
  cleqf(s0, cdif(universe, cab(s0, w0)), cab(s0, wn(w0)))
  nfdif(s0, universe, cab(s0, w0))
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  nfab1(s0, w0)
  nfab1(s0, wn(w0))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(universe, cab(s0, w0))), wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0))), wn(w0))
  notbii(wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0)), w0)
  abid(s0, w0)
  compel(s0, cab(s0, w0))
  abid(s0, wn(w0))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ralbidar
blocks.content: More general form of ~ ralbida . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralbidar(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))), wal(s0, wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))))
  sylib(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))))
  syl(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wral(s0, c0, w0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))
  alimi(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))
  pm5.74d(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1, w2)
  pm2.43(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  albi(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralbidar(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w1)â†” âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’(w1 â†” w2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w1), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w2), âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w1)), âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w2)))
  3syl(w0, (âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w1))â†” âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w2))), âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))), âˆ€(s0,((s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w1)â†”(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w2))))
  sylib(w0, âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))))
  syl(w0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, w0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))
  ex(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (w1 â†” w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))
  alimi(s0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), ((s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w1)â†”(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w2)))
  pm5.74d((s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), s0 âˆˆ c0, w1, w2)
  pm2.43(s0 âˆˆ c0, (w1 â†” w2))
  albi(s0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w1), (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’ w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w2)
}

blocks.name: rexbidar
blocks.content: More general form of ~ rexbida . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexbidar(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))
  3syl(w0, wb(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))), wal(s0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))))
  sylib(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))))
  syl(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wral(s0, c0, w0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2)))
  alimi(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))
  pm5.32d(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1, w2)
  pm2.43(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  exbi(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w1)
  df-rex(s0, c0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexbidar(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, w1)â†” âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, w2)))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w0))
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 âˆˆ c0)â†’(w1 â†” w2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, w1), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0, w2), âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w1)), âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w2)))
  3syl(w0, (âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w1))â†” âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w2))), âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))), âˆ€(s0,((s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w1)â†”(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w2))))
  sylib(w0, âˆ€(s0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))))
  syl(w0, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, w0))
  ralimi(s0, c0, w0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))
  ex(w0, s0 âˆˆ c0, (w1 â†” w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2)))
  alimi(s0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), ((s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w1)â†”(s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w2)))
  pm5.32d((s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(s0 âˆˆ c0 â†’(w1 â†” w2))), s0 âˆˆ c0, w1, w2)
  pm2.43(s0 âˆˆ c0, (w1 â†” w2))
  exbi(s0, (s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w1), (s0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ w2))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w1)
  df-rex(s0, c0, w2)
}

blocks.name: dropab1
blocks.content: Theorem to aid use of the distinctor reduction theorem with ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dropab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(copab(s0, s2, w0), copab(s1, s2, w0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(copab(s0, s2, w0), copab(s1, s2, w0), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2))), w0)))), cab(hs0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  abbidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2))), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0))))
  drex1(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2))), w0)), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0)))
  drex2(s0, s1, s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0))
  anbi1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2))), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  opeq1(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  df-opab(s0, s2, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dropab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1)â†’ { < s0, s2 > | w0 } = { < s1, s2 > | w0 })
} = {
  3eqtr4g({ < s0, s2 > | w0 }, { < s1, s2 > | w0 }, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s0, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))}, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))}, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  abbidv(hs0, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1), âˆƒ(s0, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s0, s2 > âˆ§ w0))), âˆƒ(s1, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > âˆ§ w0))))
  drex1(s0, s1, âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s0, s2 > âˆ§ w0)), âˆƒ(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > âˆ§ w0)))
  drex2(s0, s1, s2, (hs0 = < s0, s2 > âˆ§ w0), (hs0 = < s1, s2 > âˆ§ w0))
  anbi1d(âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1), hs0 = < s0, s2 >, w0, hs0 = < s1, s2 >)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < s0, s2 >, < s1, s2 >, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  sps(s0, s0 = s1, < s0, s2 > = < s1, s2 >)
  opeq1(s0, s1, s2)
  df-opab(s0, s2, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: dropab2
blocks.content: Theorem to aid use of the distinctor reduction theorem with ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dropab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(copab(s2, s0, w0), copab(s2, s1, w0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(copab(s2, s0, w0), copab(s2, s1, w0), cab(hs0, wex(s2, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0)))), cab(hs0, wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), w0)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  abbidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0))), wex(s2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), w0))))
  drex2(s0, s1, s2, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), w0)))
  drex1(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))), w0))
  anbi1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cop(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  opeq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  df-opab(s2, s0, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s2, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dropab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1)â†’ { < s2, s0 > | w0 } = { < s2, s1 > | w0 })
} = {
  3eqtr4g({ < s2, s0 > | w0 }, { < s2, s1 > | w0 }, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s2, âˆƒ(s0,(hs0 = < s2, s0 > âˆ§ w0)))}, { hs0 | âˆƒ(s2, âˆƒ(s1,(hs0 = < s2, s1 > âˆ§ w0)))}, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  abbidv(hs0, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1), âˆƒ(s2, âˆƒ(s0,(hs0 = < s2, s0 > âˆ§ w0))), âˆƒ(s2, âˆƒ(s1,(hs0 = < s2, s1 > âˆ§ w0))))
  drex2(s0, s1, s2, âˆƒ(s0,(hs0 = < s2, s0 > âˆ§ w0)), âˆƒ(s1,(hs0 = < s2, s1 > âˆ§ w0)))
  drex1(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s2, s0 > âˆ§ w0), (hs0 = < s2, s1 > âˆ§ w0))
  anbi1d(âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1), hs0 = < s2, s0 >, w0, hs0 = < s2, s1 >)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < s2, s0 >, < s2, s1 >, âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  sps(s0, s0 = s1, < s2, s0 > = < s2, s1 >)
  opeq2(s0, s1, s2)
  df-opab(s2, s0, hs0, w0)
  df-opab(s2, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0, s0 = s1))
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ipo0
blocks.content: If the identity relation partially orders any class, then that class is the null class. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipo0(class c0) {
  |- wb(wpo(cid, c0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
} = {
  impbii(wpo(cid, c0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  eq0rdv(hs0, c0, wpo(cid, c0))
  mt2i(wpo(cid, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0)))
  mpbir(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  equid(hs0)
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  ex(wpo(cid, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0))))
  poirr(cid, c0, cv(hs0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, emptycls), wpo(cid, c0), wpo(cid, emptycls))
  po0(cid)
  poeq2(c0, emptycls, cid)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wpo(cid, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ipo0(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (= âª¯ c0 â†” c0 = âˆ…)
} = {
  impbii(= âª¯ c0, c0 = âˆ…)
  eq0rdv(hs0, c0, = âª¯ c0)
  mt2i(= âª¯ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs0[=]hs0)
  mpbir(hs0[=]hs0, hs0 = hs0)
  equid(hs0)
  ideq(hs0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  ex(= âª¯ c0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, Â¬ hs0[=]hs0)
  poirr(cid, c0, hs0)
  mpbiri(c0 = âˆ…, = âª¯ c0, = âª¯ âˆ…)
  po0(cid)
  poeq2(c0, emptycls, cid)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(= âª¯ c0)
}

blocks.name: ifr0
blocks.content: A class that is founded by the identity relation is null. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ifr0(class c0) {
  |- wb(wfr(cid, c0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
} = {
  impbii(wfr(cid, c0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  eq0rdv(hs0, c0, wfr(cid, c0))
  mt2i(wfr(cid, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0)))
  mpbir(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  equid(hs0)
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  ex(wfr(cid, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs0))))
  frirr(cid, c0, cv(hs0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, emptycls), wfr(cid, c0), wfr(cid, emptycls))
  fr0(cid)
  freq2(c0, emptycls, cid)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wfr(cid, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ifr0(class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (=[Fr]c0 â†” c0 = âˆ…)
} = {
  impbii(=[Fr]c0, c0 = âˆ…)
  eq0rdv(hs0, c0, =[Fr]c0)
  mt2i(=[Fr]c0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs0[=]hs0)
  mpbir(hs0[=]hs0, hs0 = hs0)
  equid(hs0)
  ideq(hs0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  ex(=[Fr]c0, hs0 âˆˆ c0, Â¬ hs0[=]hs0)
  frirr(cid, c0, hs0)
  mpbiri(c0 = âˆ…, =[Fr]c0, =[Fr]âˆ…)
  fr0(cid)
  freq2(c0, emptycls, cid)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(=[Fr]c0)
}

blocks.name: ordpss
blocks.content: ~ ordelpss with an antecedent removed. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)

blocks.name: fvsb
blocks.content: Explicit substitution of a value of a function into a wff. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 1-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wb(wsbc(s1, cfv(c1, c0), w0), wex(s1, wa(wal(s0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5bb(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wsbc(s1, cfv(c1, c0), w0), wex(s1, wa(wal(s0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w0)), wsbc(s1, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), w0))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, cfv(c1, c0), w0), wsbc(s1, cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), w0)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)))))
  df-fv(s0, c1, c0)
  dfsbcq(s1, cfv(c1, c0), cio(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), w0)
  iotasbc(s0, s1, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆƒ!(s0, c0[c1]s0)â†’([(c1 ` c0)/ s1]w0 â†” âˆƒ(s1,(âˆ€(s0,(c0[c1]s0 â†” s0 = s1))âˆ§ w0))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5bb(âˆƒ!(s0, c0[c1]s0), [(c1 ` c0)/ s1]w0, âˆƒ(s1,(âˆ€(s0,(c0[c1]s0 â†” s0 = s1))âˆ§ w0)), [iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s1]w0)
  ax-mp(([(c1 ` c0)/ s1]w0 â†”[iota(s0, c0[c1]s0)/ s1]w0), (c1 ` c0)= iota(s0, c0[c1]s0))
  df-fv(s0, c1, c0)
  dfsbcq(s1, (c1 ` c0), iota(s0, c0[c1]s0), w0)
  iotasbc(s0, s1, c0[c1]s0, w0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fveqsb
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of a value of a function into a wff. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 1-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm fveqsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), wb(w0, wex(s1, wa(wal(s0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1, c0)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5bbr(weu(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0))), w0, wex(s1, wa(wal(s0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w1)), wsbc(s1, cfv(c1, c0), w1))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, cfv(c1, c0), w1), w0), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), universe))
  fvex(c1, c0)
  sbciegf(s1, cfv(c1, c0), universe, w1, w0)
  fvsb(s0, s1, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fveqsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆƒ!(s0, c0[c1]s0)â†’(w0 â†” âˆƒ(s1,(âˆ€(s0,(c0[c1]s0 â†” s0 = s1))âˆ§ w1))))
  âŠ£ (s1 =(c1 ` c0)â†’(w1 â†” w0))
  âŠ£ F/(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5bbr(âˆƒ!(s0, c0[c1]s0), w0, âˆƒ(s1,(âˆ€(s0,(c0[c1]s0 â†” s0 = s1))âˆ§ w1)), [(c1 ` c0)/ s1]w1)
  ax-mp(([(c1 ` c0)/ s1]w1 â†” w0), (c1 ` c0)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  fvex(c1, c0)
  sbciegf(s1, (c1 ` c0), universe, w1, w0)
  fvsb(s0, s1, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: xpexb
blocks.content: A Cartesian product exists iff its converse does. Corollary 6.9(1) in [TakeutiZaring] p. 26. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: trelpss
blocks.content: An element of a transitive set is a proper subset of it. Theorem 7.2 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 35. Unlike ~ tz7.2 , ~ ax-reg is required for its proof. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Nov-2011.)
